definition[0]: (1976â€“) a Brazilian football player who was considered to be one of the best in the world. He played for many leading football clubs, including Barcelona, Inter Milan, Real Madrid, AC Milan, and the Brazilian national team. He was named World Player of the Year in 1996,1997, and 2002. The last team he played for was Corinthians, and in 2011 he announced that he was going to retire from playing football.
